Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. We believe it's worth far more than its face value, but let's make this transaction work for both of us. I'm extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that set it apart. I trust you'll find the investment worthwhile. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
